answers.answer: That's hypoglycemic, drink some juice now! That's not good, your baby and you should be ok but getting that low of blood sugar is still not good. Also hypoglycemia is a sign of diabetes, can be anyways. Be aware and is say eat more snacks if you can to keep blood sugar up

question: I am 29 weeks pregnant and my blood sugar level is 57. Should I be concerned?!
title: blood sugar level of 57
